entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpxrfxcal9\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0124.9586] The element FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent with a value of 370,500,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Finance Lease liability Noncurrent is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Finance Lease liability Noncurrent has been apportioned.
Period :2021-03-27 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9586 Rule version: 16.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1037038/000103703821000022/rl-20210327.htm 4

[DQC.US.0124.9586] The element FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent with a value of 189,400,000 has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case either: 1. The element FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList should be used to identify the account where the Finance Lease liability Noncurrent is included; or 2. The Balance Sheet location axis should be used with two or more account members to identify into which financial statement captions the Finance Lease liability Noncurrent has been apportioned.
Period :2020-03-28 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -5
Rule Element Id:9586 Rule version: 16.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1037038/000103703821000022/rl-20210327.htm 4
